content: this gorgeous melina beanie is the perfect compliment to the melina infinity scarf it has a lovely texture and works up quickly this pattern is one of the january contributions to the 2024 hat of the month cal > this pattern is available for free on > my blog or purchase the ad-free pdf as > a digital download above **materials ** * approximately 44-150 yds of category 4 medium weight yarn i used knit picks brava tweed yarn in the rosefinch colorway * size j 6mm furls streamline zodiac capricorn crochet hook * yarn needle for weaving ends * scissors
